properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued February 2 at 2:42PM PST until February 3 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 25 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt and seas 13 to 16 feet expected. For the Hazardous
Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous seas 14 to 17 feet around
10 seconds are expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest
winds 20 to 30 kt with localized gusts up to 40 kt and seas 13
to 15 feet.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 10 AM Monday to 3 AM PST
Tuesday. For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 10 PM this
evening to 10 AM PST Monday. For the Small Craft Advisory,
until 10 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... ...GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM MONDAY TO 3 AM PST TUESDAY
